passives.name: Aim Extension
passives.desc:
Aim use count +2

When using Aim:
 • Becomes 2-hit BRV attack; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage

After using Aim:
 • Triggers additional HP attack

passives.name: Buffed Attack Boost Up

passives.short_desc: Buffed Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Attack Boost Extension
passives.desc:
When using Attack Boost:
 • Effects granted to party
 • Slight ATK Up boost
 • Party: Grants BRV based on own ATK

After using Attack Boost: 
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (great BRV damage boost; guaranteed hit) for 6 turns
passives.short_desc: Attack Boost Extension: Boost to Attack Boost

passives.desc: Slightly raises party's INT BRV、 MAX BRV

 • BRV damage boost

passive.name: Daddy's Inspiration
passive.desc:
Attack Boost use +1
Upon using Attack Boost:
 • Higher turn rate、 ATK Up、 Critical Hit Rate Up boost、 duration+
 • Target: 6 turns MAX BRV Up II
 • Self: 6 turns MAX BRV Up II、 ATK Up II、 Critical Hit Rate Up V、 SPD Up II
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ for 6 turns
passive.short_desc: Daddy's Inspiration: Boost to Attack Boost
